attributes.action: Implement the 11 United Nations recommendations to prevent abuse of UK citizens
attributes.additional_details: The United Nations recommendations can be found in their report here: http://d.pr/f/dob2
attributes.background: The United Nations carried out an Inquiry against the UK under article 6 of the Optional Protocol to the Convention and made 11 recommendations to the UK Government. This petition is for the UK Government to implement those 11 recommendations.
